narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
This first prelicense inspection for a Class A license and exit review were conducted with the applicant and facility
representative.
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
The applicant will submit the license fee to the following address:
USDA/APHIS/ANIMAL CARE
2150 Centre Avenue
Building B; Mail Stop #3W11
Fort Collins, CO   80526
Additional Inspectors
Neis Cynthia, Compliance Specialist
